column5:
わたしは一匹の獣が海の中から
現れるのを見た。

これには、１０の目、１０の耳、
そして１０の鼻があった。
column6:
\n
\n
I saw a beast appear from the ocean.\n
\n
\n
It had ten eyes, ten ears, and ten noses.

column5:
熱く金色に輝く王冠を戴き、獣は集
いし人々に伝えた。

　「哀れな子らよ。
　　お前達の前に道はない。
　　
　　先へ進みたいのならば、
　　私の言葉に従うがよい。」

かくして、人々は真の世界へと足を
踏み入れた。
column6:
\n
\n
Donning a crown sparkling fiercely in gold, the beast spoke to the assembled people.\n
\n
\n
 "O pitiful children.\n
  There is no road before you.\n
\n
\n
  If you wish to move forward,\n
  follow my words."\n
\n
\n
Thus did the people set foot into the true world.

column5:
園木達郎氏へ

草薙刑事が死亡した際に検死を担当
した医師が、その直後に失踪してい
る。
名前は窪田晃（くぼたあきら）。
組織も消息をつかめなかった様だが
１年ほど前に、さつきヶ丘に戻って
いた事が判明。現在は「木下哲雄」
との偽名を用いて、４丁目のアパー
トに住んでいる。
column6:
\n
\n
To Mr. Tatsurou Sonoki,\n
\n
\n
The doctor who performed the autopsy upon Detective Kusanagi's death disappeared immediately afterwards.\n
His name is Akira Kubota.\n
\n
\n
It appears the Syndicate wasn't able to figure out his whereabouts either, but I've ascertained that he returned to Satsukigaoka about a year ago. Currently, he's living under the alias of "Tetsuo Kinoshita" in an apartment in District 4.

column5:
なお、組織の榊が戻ってきている。
注意されたし。




　　　　　　　　以上。「獣」より
column6:
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
In addition, Sakaki from the Syndicate has returned. Watch yourself.\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
        That's all. From "Beast"

column6: In addition, Sakaki from the Syndicate has returned. Watch yourself.
column7: NOTE: to accommodate the slightly-differently-spaced version of this message in adv-0x36C2, i've split it into two parts

column5:
被験者　草薙英二
症状　　外傷は認められない。
　　　　心臓が衰弱しており、虚脱
　　　　症状が認められる。
　　　　また一部に脱水症状も確認
死因　　バルビツール酸系の睡眠薬
　　　　を大量摂取した事による、
　　　　中枢神経系の抑制。
報告者　窪田晃
　　　　　　　　　　　　　大瀧
column6:
\n
\n
EXAMINEE: Eiji Kusanagi\n
\n
CONDITION: No signs of external\n
  injury. The heart is weakened,\n
  and symptoms of collapse are\n
  present.\n
  Additionally, signs of\n
  dehydration confirmed in an\n
  area.\n
\n
CAUSE OF DEATH: Suppression of\n
  central nervous system\n
  resulting from ingestion of a\n
  large quantity of barbituate\n
  sleeping pills.\n
\n
EXAMINER\n
  Akira Kubota

column5:
被験者　草薙英二
症状　　腹部に１，胸部に２箇所の
　　　　銃創があり、かなりの出血
　　　　が認められる。
　　　　各銃創から１個ずつ、計３
　　　　個の弾丸を発見。うち１発
　　　　は心臓を貫通。
死因　　損傷による心機能の停止
報告者　窪田晃
column6:
\n
\n
\n
EXAMINEE: Eiji Kusanagi\n
\n
CONDITION: One gunshot wound in\n
  the abdomen and two in the\n
  chest, with significant\n
  bleeding confirmed.\n
  Three bullets found, one in\n
  each wound. Of these, one\n
  pierced the heart.\n
\n
CAUSE OF DEATH: Stoppage of the\n
  heart resulting from injury.
\n
\n
EXAMINER\n
  Akira Kubota

column5:
この検案書は、故草薙英二の検死結
果を報告するものである。
しかしながら、さつきヶ丘警察署長
である大瀧剛に強要きれ、私が事実
とは異なる報告をした為に、草薙氏
は自殺として処理されてしまった。
いつの日か‥いつの日か大瀧の罪を
世に知らしめる為に、本物の検案書
を証拠として隠しておこう。
column6:
\n
\n
\n
This autopsy report documents the results of the late Eiji Kusanagi's postmortem.\n
\n
However, under compulsion from Tsuyoshi Ohtaki, Satsukigaoka Chief of Police, I have been forced to act as if Mr. Kusanagi committed suicide.\n
\n
So that someday...someday, Ohtaki's crimes may be made known to the world, I am hiding the true report as evidence.

column6:
// nothing
************
// real password
BEAST*******
// items on menu
APPLE*PIE***
PANCAKES****
SANDWICH****
SPAGHETTI***
COFFEE******
LEMON*TEA***
MILK*TEA****
// originally spelling variation for "spaghetti", now used for extra accepted variations on "beast"
THE*BEAST***
THEBEAST****
// other spelling variations (irrelevant in english)
MILK*TEA****
// unlisted items
CAFE*AU*LAIT
COCOA*******
MELON*SODA**
COLA********
MAY*STAR****
column7:
NOTE: translation uses 12 characters per item, padded with null (*). the translation allows for space characters to be input; these are internally remapped to null to allow trailing spaces to be ignored, so the passwords here use nulls instead of spaces.

NOTE: anticipating something players might try, the translation adds an additional special case so that an input of "THE BEAST" will be treated the same as just "BEAST".
and for that one person who won't realize there's a space character despite the fact that it starts out highlighted, "THEBEAST" is also accepted, though it pains me slightly.
